content.body: At the next plenary, I am planning to present the results of the dataflow ad-hoc meeting (as well as the results of the recent function-helpers incubator meeting), with an eye towards future advancement of the pipe operator and a bind/call-this operator. Hopefully that sounds good to everyone.
content.formatted_body: At the next plenary, I am planning to present the results of the dataflow ad-hoc meeting (as well as the results of the recent function-helpers incubator meeting), with an eye towards future advancement of the pipe operator and a bind/call-this operator. Hopefully that sounds good to everyone.

content.body: I also plan to ask for time to bikeshed both the topic reference and the syntax of bind/call-this.
content.formatted_body: I also plan to ask for time to bikeshed both the topic reference and the syntax of bind/call-this.

content.body: I’ll try to have slides for these by March 18.
content.formatted_body: I’ll try to have slides for these by March 18.

content.body: Yes, that matches what I was expecting. So just to be clear - we're asking the committee to help decide the topic reference this meeting, but *not* asking for Stage 2 yet, right? That'll be next meeting, assuming the bikeshedding concludes satisfactorily?
